text: Greater Lowell is the name given to the city of Lowell, Massachusetts and its suburbs in Middlesex County. Besides Lowell, it includes eight towns: Billerica, Chelmsford, Dracut, Dunstable, Pepperell, Tewksbury, Tyngsborough, and Westford. As of the 2020 census, 310,009 people lived there. ==References== ==Other websites== *Lowell Sun newspaper *Chamber of Commerce *Northern Middlesex Council of Governments *The Greater Merrimack Valley Convention & Visitors Bureau *Lowell at city-data.com Category:Cities in Massachusetts
title: Greater Lowell
